meanings.definition: A chemical compound found in certain plants, used for its medicinal properties.
meanings.sent1: The elaterins in the plant help with healing wounds.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often prescribe medications containing elaterins for their patients.
meanings.sent3: The elaterins in the herbal remedy made the medicine taste bitter.
meanings.sent4: Herbalists believe that elaterins have magical healing powers.
meanings.sent5: The elaterins in the plant glowed softly under the moonlight.

meanings.definition: The plural form of elaterin, referring to multiple instances of the chemical compound.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist stocked various elaterins on the shelves.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the effects of different elaterins on the body.
meanings.sent3: The elaterins in the garden were carefully cultivated for their properties.
meanings.sent4: In the lab, scientists observed the behavior of elaterins under different conditions.
meanings.sent5: The market offered a wide selection of elaterins for purchase.
